item.title: CA Technologies is offering a free migration tool for Windows XP
item.description:
If you need to upgrade from Windows XP, there’s a free tool that can help. Developed by CA Technologies, CA Desktop Migration Manager (CA DMM) is a software solution designed to manage, upgrade, and maintain laptops and desktops. It can also migrate a Windows XP computer to a more secure operating system. “Since Microsoft is no longer providing ongoing technical support and security updates for Windows XP, our customers are exposed to vulnerabilities and significant risks,” says Vic Mankotia, VP of Solution Strategy for Asia Pacific & Japan at CA Technologies...

item.title: CA Technologies believes that Asia has the potential to become a central hub of global innovation
item.description:
Lionel Lim, President for Asia Pacific & Japan at CA Technologies, believes the significant data exchange happening within Asia indicates the region’s potential to become a leading force in innovation. During a Chinese New Year event in Singapore, Lim stated that Asia is capable of matching Europe and the US in driving innovation. He emphasized that the focus is shifting from cost reduction to accelerating innovation. Lim highlighted four key areas for innovation and differentiation: improving user experience, ensuring convenient, fast, and secure data access, utilizing technologies that boost business growth, and strengthening IT skills...
